text:
Important. #COVID_19 #Vaccines: Please read the @NIHDirector's blog on Celebrating the Gift of COVID-19 Vaccines.

We hope that when your chance for #immunization comes, you will roll up your sleeve and accept the potentially life-saving gift of a #COVID19 #vaccine. @NIH #nihCEAL https://t.co/fnG7eWQCXQ https://t.co/bnsIDs5VXd
